page.title: 16A Theosophist Community
page.content:
Tekels Park is a Theosophist estate. It is not a cult or a religion but a sort of association of people who believe in a{divine being.}They are also{vegetarians.}The original house, The Coach House, has its kitchen garden divided into allotments for the inhabitants to grow vegetables on. They all have individual houses elsewhere in the estate.
The property is{private,}making it impossible to go and walk in the grounds.
Tekels Park claims to have a{ghost.} She is apparently about 5'5", wears a white robe and only appears at parties given by the descendents of the Burns. She is seen sitting under the light, but if anyone attempts to speak to her she disappears.
